```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggfortify)
```

```{r autoplot.matrix, cache = TRUE}
autoplot(matrix(rnorm(20), nc = 5))
autoplot(matrix(rnorm(20), nc = 5), fill = 'red')
autoplot(matrix(rnorm(20), nc = 2), geom = 'point')



```
